text: @DrJitendraSingh @PIB_India @PMOIndia @narendramodi @AmitShah @JPNadda @PrakashJavdekar @BJP4India Fear of COVID19 is new to market but we are living under agony and pain of unemployment disease. SSC has blown our hope on the ground of it's arbitrary rule. @narendramodi @DoPTGoI @DrJitendraSingh
